title: More than 20 Samsung devices have already received the Feb 2022 security patches
content:
Samsung has been doing an excellent job of keeping its devices up to date with the latest security patches. The company started rolling out the Android security patches for February 2022 to its devices towards the end of last month, and the Galaxy Note 20 and Galaxy A50s were the first devices to receive the

The post More than 20 Samsung devices have already received the Feb 2022 security patches appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung has already pushed the February 2022 security patches to over 20 devices. Check out the post for more info on the rollout.
